Posts.Content: Hi I’m feeling a bit anxious  I have been diagnosed with breast cancer 13mm tumour grade 3 , hormone receptive and her negative . They are sending me for a bone scan mri scan and ct scan to see if it has spread. Now I’m worried that it has , is this normal they they usually do this?
Posts.Title: Scans to check if bc has spread

Posts.Content: Thanks optimistic , they couldn’t see any swollen nodes on ultrasound but they have booked me in to take 2 out next week to check
Posts.Title: Scans to check if bc has spread

Posts.Content: Thankyou everyone I’m just soo worried as I know we all are or have been , I’ve never even been ill before apart from the odd cold, I’m finding this soo scary I really need to try and stay positive. I’ve lost soo many family members to cancer so I allways associate this with a bad ending. Hopefully the scans will be clear , thankyou for all your replies it’s definitely helped a lot.
Posts.Title: Scans to check if bc has spread

Posts.Content: Hi DL  That’s the same veins they use for me on my wrist I don’t seem to have any others , but so far it’s been ok no picc line yet . Ive been told I’ll also have a full axillary clearance when they operate. I didn’t use the cold cap but to be honest loosing my hair wasn’t half as traumatic as I was expecting, I have got a wig which I wear when I go out, and just wear a hat around the house  Lynn
Posts.Title: Neo adjuvant chemotherapy, midway scan

Posts.Content: Hi Fireman’s wife ,  The waiting for results always seems the worst , hopefully it has worked for you . I feel nervous I’m really hoping it will shrink . Hopefully you don’t wait too long for the results xx
Posts.Title: Neo adjuvant chemotherapy, midway scan

Posts.Content: Hi all , I’ve just had my second chemo of 6 fec-t  I see the oncologist next week but I’m wondering do they normally do a midway scan to check the chemo is working? Is it an ultrasound or mri? I have idc 20mm grade 3 1 positive node that I know of.
Posts.Title: Neo adjuvant chemotherapy, midway scan

Posts.Content: Thanks Toxophilite  They hadn’t mentioned one , I just wondered how they know if it’s actually shrinking .
Posts.Title: Neo adjuvant chemotherapy, midway scan

Posts.Content: Thanks Aspen , I see the oncologist on Monday so I will ask, I was hoping if they did it wouldn’t be mri. hope your doing ok with the chemo  Lynn
Posts.Title: Neo adjuvant chemotherapy, midway scan

Posts.Content: I know no one can probably really answer but I had my bone scan yesterday , the day before I had a senital node biopsy so I had had the nuclear Medicine that day too. When the lady was doing the scan she said she needed to take pictures of the sides of my ribs too as I had my arms by my side. I asked her if that was normal and she just said it will be more active there because if yesterday, does that mean she found something?
Posts.Title: I’m going out of my mind with anxiety

Posts.Content: Hi all just after a bit of advise , I had a senital node biopsy today I was told they were going to take 2 nodes but they only took 1 . Is this a usual thing?
Posts.Title: Senital node biopsy
